name: Area Alert Mek - Pneuma
description:
After your opponent plays 3 Action Cards, deal 1 Hydro DMG.
When taking DMG from a character with Arkhe: Ousia: Cancel this effect.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your opponent plays 3 Action Cards</color>, deal 1 $[K102].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When taking DMG from a character with {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia:</color> Cancel this effect.
